simple example

Source code
main.cpp 
          
#include "aux.h"
#include <iostream>

int main()
{       
    int control_flag=0;
    //$ ask user whether to proceed
    std::cin >> control_flag;
    
    if (control_flag==1){
        //$ call shower
        //pointer to the object VINCIA
        VINCIA* vinciaOBJ = new VINCIA();
        vinciaOBJ->shower();  //$   
    }
    return 0;
}
aux.h 
class VINCIA {
public:
    void shower();
};
aux.cpp 
#include "aux.h"
#include <iostream>

void VINCIA::shower(){
//$ do VINCIA parton shower
std::cout << "the parton shower code would go here";
//$1 1) prepare system of partons

//$1 2) do phase 1 of shower

//$1 3)...

return;
};
